lead_paragraph: LAUTERSTEIN--Henry Weil, 86, on April 27, 2016. A longtime resident of Stamford and graduate of Milton Academy, Harvard College and Columbia University Law School, Henry joined his father, Leon Lauterstein in the law firm, Lauterstein & Lauterstein, where his clients included Kobrand Wine & Spirits and The Metropolitan Opera. His valued advice resulted in him joining the Met as in-house counsel in 1981 until his retirement. A lover of nature, opera, baseball, an avid fisherman and frequent visitor to Maine, Henry readily shared his knowledge and passions. A beloved husband, father, grandfather and life partner, Henry was predeceased by his wife, Katherine Mebane and his son, David. He will be dearly missed by his daughters Dorothy Doppstadt and Margaret Mandell, his partner Fred Wyatt, his son-in-law, Jonathan Mandell and his grandchildren, Lucas, Emily, Daniel and Natalie. 1/3
